EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for your RSVP
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Welcome to The Glenlivet Guardians!
Thank you for taking the time to attend the Legacy Tasting session of The Glenlivet whiskies at The Powder Room. We hope that you have enjoyed the session.
We would like to take this opportunity to welcome you as a member of The Glenlivet Guardians, an exclusive league of aficionados with knowledge and passion for the single malt that started it all.
Created by enthusiasts for enthusiasts, a world of exclusive privileges with the Guardian programme awaits you, such as members-only access to private tastings, limited edition releases, invitations to unique events and exclusive downloads.
We look forward to seeing you at the next event for The Glenlivet Guardians.
For an experience of infinite elegance, indulge in the distinctive taste of our classic whisky range, The Glenlivet 12, 15, 18 and 25 Year Old.
Please contact us for more information about exclusive promotions for The Glenlivet Guardians.
